_readme.description: Slack App Manifest for Inkeep Agent Work App
_readme.usage: 1. Replace <YOUR_API_DOMAIN> with your API URL (e.g. your-name-agents-api.ngrok.app for local dev, or api.agents.yourdomain.com for production). 2. Copy this manifest to Slack App settings at https://api.slack.com/apps. 3. Delete this _readme section before pasting.
_readme.local_dev: For local development, use ngrok: ngrok http 3002 --hostname <YOUR_API_DOMAIN>
_readme.production: For production, use your deployed API domain
